languages.text: "Что навело вас на столь дерзкую мысль? Мой прекрасный наряд? Мои восхитительные украшения? Не беспокойтесь, шерин, когда, буде на то воля {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Великого{/g}, я стану баронессой, обязательно дам вам знать. Только представьте, сколь крепкий и плодотворный союз может получиться у {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} и одного из повелителей Касбаллики".

traits.locale_text: "Что навело вас на столь дерзкую мысль? Мой прекрасный наряд? Мои восхитительные украшения? Не беспокойтесь, шерин, когда, буде на то воля {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Великого{/g}, я стану баронессой, обязательно дам вам знать. Только представьте, сколь крепкий и плодотворный союз может получиться у {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} и одного из повелителей Касбаллики".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "What gave you such an outrageous idea? Was it my immaculate garment? My gorgeous jewellery? Do not worry, shereen, I will let you know once I become a baroness — should the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} will it. Just imagine the strong and fruitful alliance that could be forged between a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and a mastermind of the Kasballica."
languages.original_text: "Что навело вас на столь дерзкую мысль? Мой прекрасный наряд? Мои восхитительные украшения? Не беспокойтесь, шерин, когда, буде на то воля {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Великого{/g}, я стану баронессой, обязательно дам вам знать. Только представьте, сколь крепкий и плодотворный союз может получиться у {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} и одного из повелителей Касбаллики".

Do not worry, shereen, I will let you know once I become a baroness — should the Great One will it. Just imagine what strong and fruitful alliance could be forged between a Rogue Trader and a mastermind of Kasballica."

languages.text: “是什么让你产生了如此离谱的想法？是我完美无瑕的着装吗？还是我华丽的珠宝？别担心，亲爱的。假如{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}至高无上的神皇{/g}允许，我真的成为了强盗男爵，那我一定会告诉你的。想象一下，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}与卡斯巴利卡的阴谋大师，这两者可以结成多么强大、多么前途无量的联盟啊。”
languages.original_text: "What gave you such an outrageous idea? Was it my immaculate garment? My gorgeous jewellery? Do not worry, shereen, I will let you know once I become a baroness — should the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} will it. Just imagine the strong and fruitful alliance that could be forged between a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and a mastermind of the Kasballica."

traits.locale_text: “是什么让你产生了如此离谱的想法？是我完美无瑕的着装吗？还是我华丽的珠宝？别担心，亲爱的。假如{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}至高无上的神皇{/g}允许，我真的成为了强盗男爵夫人，那我一定会告诉你的。想象一下，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}与卡斯巴利卡的阴谋大师，这两者可以结成多么强大、多么前途无量的联盟啊。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "What gave you such an outrageous idea? Was it my immaculate garment? My gorgeous jewellery? Do not worry, shereen, I will let you know once I become a baroness — should the Exalted One will it. Just imagine the strong and fruitful alliance that could be forged between a Rogue Trader and a mastermind of the Kasballica."

languages.text: «¿De dónde ha sacado una idea tan absurda? ¿De mi ropa inmaculada? ¿De mi hermosa joyería? No se preocupe, shereen, será {mf|el|la} primer{mf|o|a} en enterarse cuando me convierta en baronesa, si el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exaltado{/g} quiere. Imagínese lo poderosa y provechosa que sería una alianza entre un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} y una de las señoras de la Kasballica».
languages.original_text: "What gave you such an outrageous idea? Was it my immaculate garment? My gorgeous jewellery? Do not worry, shereen, I will let you know once I become a baroness — should the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} will it. Just imagine the strong and fruitful alliance that could be forged between a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and a mastermind of the Kasballica."

traits.locale_text: «¿De dónde ha sacado una idea tan absurda? ¿De mi ropa inmaculada? ¿De mi hermosa joyería? No se preocupe, shereen, será {mf|el|la} primer{mf|o|a} en enterarse cuando me convierta en baronesa, si el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exaltado{/g} quiere. Imagínese lo poderosa y provechosa que sería una alianza entre un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} y una de las señoras de la Kasballica».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「どうしてそんなとんでもないことを思いついたんだい？あたしの汚れ1つない衣服のせい？それとも豪華な宝飾品？ご心配なく、あたしが男爵夫人になった暁にはお知らせしてあげるよ…{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}エグザルテッド・ワン{/g}がそれを望まれるならね。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}とカスバリカの首謀者の間に、強力で実りある同盟が結ばれることを想像してみなよ」
languages.original_text: "What gave you such an outrageous idea? Was it my immaculate garment? My gorgeous jewellery? Do not worry, shereen, I will let you know once I become a baroness — should the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} will it. Just imagine the strong and fruitful alliance that could be forged between a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and a mastermind of the Kasballica."

traits.locale_text: 「どうしてそんなとんでもないことを思いついたんだい？あたしの汚れ1つない衣服のせい？それとも豪華な宝飾品？ご心配なく、あたしが男爵夫人になった暁にはお知らせしてあげるよ…{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}エグザルテッド・ワン{/g}がそれを望まれるならね。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}とカスバリカの首謀者の間に、強力で実りある同盟が結ばれることを想像してみなよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wie seid Ihr denn auf diesen unerhörten Gedanken gekommen? War es mein makelloses Gewand? Mein wunderschöner Schmuck? Keine Sorge, Shereen, ich gebe Euch Bescheid, falls ich je zur Baronin werden — sollte der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Erhabene{/g} es denn so einrichten. Stellt Euch nur die starke und fruchtbare Allianz vor, die zwischen einem {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} und einem Mastermind der Kasballica entstehen könnte."
languages.original_text: "What gave you such an outrageous idea? Was it my immaculate garment? My gorgeous jewellery? Do not worry, shereen, I will let you know once I become a baroness — should the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} will it. Just imagine the strong and fruitful alliance that could be forged between a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and a mastermind of the Kasballica."

traits.locale_text: "Wie seid Ihr denn auf diesen unerhörten Gedanken gekommen? War es mein makelloses Gewand? Mein wunderschöner Schmuck? Keine Sorge, Shereen, ich gebe Euch Bescheid, falls ich je zur Baronin werden — sollte der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Erhabene{/g} es denn so einrichten. Stellt Euch nur die starke und fruchtbare Allianz vor, die zwischen einem {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} und einem Mastermind der Kasballica entstehen könnte."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce qui a bien pu vous donner une idée aussi ridicule ? Est-ce ma tenue impeccable ? Mes splendides bijoux ? N'ayez crainte, shereen, je vous préviendrai quand je deviendrai baronne... si l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalté{/g} le veut. Imaginez simplement l'alliance aussi puissante que féconde que pourraient nouer {mf|un|une} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} et un cerveau de la Kasballica. »
languages.original_text: "What gave you such an outrageous idea? Was it my immaculate garment? My gorgeous jewellery? Do not worry, shereen, I will let you know once I become a baroness — should the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} will it. Just imagine the strong and fruitful alliance that could be forged between a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and a mastermind of the Kasballica."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce qui a bien pu vous donner une idée aussi ridicule ? Est-ce ma tenue impeccable ? Mes splendides bijoux ? N'ayez crainte, shereen, je vous préviendrai quand je deviendrai baronne... si l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalté{/g} le veut. Imaginez simplement l'alliance aussi puissante que féconde que pourraient nouer {mf|un|une} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} et un cerveau de la Kasballica. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Böyle uçuk bir fikre nereden kapıldın? Pirüpak elbiselerimden dolayı mı? Yoksa göz alıcı mücevherlerimden mi? Merak etme şirinim, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Görkemli{/g} o günleri gösterir de bir gün barones olursam ilk sana söylerim. Bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} ile büyük bir Kasballica lideri arasında kurulabilecek güçlü ve muazzam verimli ittifakı bir hayal etsene."
languages.original_text: "What gave you such an outrageous idea? Was it my immaculate garment? My gorgeous jewellery? Do not worry, shereen, I will let you know once I become a baroness — should the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} will it. Just imagine the strong and fruitful alliance that could be forged between a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and a mastermind of the Kasballica."

traits.locale_text: "Böyle uçuk bir fikre nereden kapıldın? Pirüpak elbiselerimden dolayı mı? Yoksa göz alıcı mücevherlerimden mi? Merak etme şirinim, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Görkemli{/g} o günleri gösterir de bir gün barones olursam gelip ilk sana söylerim. Bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} ve büyük bir Kasballica lideri arasında kurulabilecek güçlü ve muazzam verimli ittifakı bir hayal etsene."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
